title: manavyAla kimpavadEmi
sahitya:
manavyAla kimpavadEmi mA vENugOpAla smi


anupallavi

  ninu nammina vADani mrokkaga nA


caraNam 1    satatamu ninnE cAla nammina nA veta tIrppumani vEDukO gAna
    caraNam 2    vinatAsuta gamana nannu brOvumani nItO palumAru balkaga nA
    caraNam 3    bAla vENugOpAla dAsuni pAlincumani prArttimpaka nA
